steps.run: apt-get update && apt-get install -y pkg-config libcairo2-dev libpango1.0-dev libjpeg-dev libgif-dev librsvg2-dev libpng-dev
export BUN_INSTALL=$HOME/.bun && export PATH=$BUN_INSTALL/bin:$PATH && bun install --frozen-lockfile
export BUN_INSTALL=$HOME/.bun && export PATH=$BUN_INSTALL/bin:$PATH && bun run build
